control.name: 8.2.6 - Use one time unique passwords/passphrases for first use
control.desc: If the same password is used for every new user, an internal user, former employee, or malicious individual may know or easily discover this password, and use it to gain access to accounts.

test.steps: 8.2.6 Examine password procedures and observe security personnel to verify that first-time passwords/passphrases for new users, and reset passwords/passphrases for existing users, are set to a unique value for each user and changed after first use.
